talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Humming_00>♪The sludge is gone! Hooray, hooray!
The sludge has gone away, away!♪
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>They found The Exalted Dorephan!<sp:5:1:0> And!
Also! King Sidon returned to the domain!

<snd:LaughS_00>♪It's amazing! It's great! Maybe it's
even fate!♪
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Humming_00>Hee-hee!<sp:5:0:0> I'm doing hard work for the
King Sidon fan club!

I mean, can you believe it?<sp:5:0:0>
Now our super-charming Sidon
is the ACTUAL KING!
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>So I've got a lot on my plate, you know?
I can't just play kiddie games all day.<sp:5:1:0>
♪No way, no way!♪
<snd:LaughL_00>♪I've gotta support our wonderful and
amazing king every single day!♪
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Ooh! Now that Sidon is king...


Do you think he'll become all huge like
The Exalted Dorephan?!

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>Hee-hee, can you imagine? I'm sooo
looking forward to watching him GROW
into his new role!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Wakeup>It's time to get some sleep.<sp:5:1:0>
See you tomorrow!
